Articles.Content:
Hey all,

about time to finally register here after a month of lurking.

I stumbled over the Demo some time ago, after a few days of crazy rocket-science it was clear that I can't get away from KSP anymore, so I got the game.

Career mode is awesome, great fun and good to learn the game as one unlocks tech after tech.

I almost completely unlocked the tech-tree in 0.22, built a small space station, visited most of the planets out there but now I am giving it a completely new go with 0.23.

I am still trying to figure out how to build SSTOs and how to design manned return missions to places further than Mun, but hey, thats the fun and challenge in KSP.

So, here I am...

Greets,

Fjord

I can't get away from KSP anymore, so I got the game.

...

I am giving it a completely new go with 0.23.

That's KSP ! :-) Welcome !
Welcome! Good luck with your missions, and enjoy your stay
